languages.text: {n}Калькасар, молча наблюдавший за разворачивающейся сценой, не торопясь отхлебывает из кружки.{/n} "Что ж. Надеюсь, что сократившийся состав свиты не помешает вам исполнить свой долг, {name}. Свободны".

{n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."
languages.original_text: {n}Калькасар, молча наблюдавший за разворачивающейся сценой, не торопясь отхлебывает из кружки.{/n} "Что ж. Надеюсь, что сократившийся состав свиты не помешает вам исполнить свой долг, {name}. Свободны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar, who was observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his mug.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to you in doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

{n}Calcazar, who was observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his mug.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to you in doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

{n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his mug.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to you in doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

{n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

{n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎一直在默默地注视着一切。此刻，他端起了杯子，慢慢地抿了一口。{/n}“好吧，希望这些随行人员离开之后，也不会妨碍你履行职责，{name}。解散。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎一直在默默地注视着一切。此刻，他端起了杯子，慢慢地抿了一口。{/n}“好吧，希望这些随行人员离开之后，也不会妨碍你履行职责，{name}。解散。”

languages.text: {n}その場を黙って見ていたカルカサルは、ゆっくりと一口、カップから飲んだ。{/n}「まぁ、そういう事です。従者が減っても、職務を遂行する上で支障がないことを願う、{name}。さらばだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: {n}その場を黙って見ていたカルカサルは、ゆっくりと一口、カップから飲んだ。{/n}「まぁ、そういう事です。従者が減っても、職務を遂行する上で支障がないことを願う、{name}。さらばだ」

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, que ha estado observando la escena en silencio, da un sorbo lento a su taza.{/n} «Espero que un séquito reducido no sea obstáculo para que cumpla con su deber, {name}. Puede retirarse».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar, que ha estado observando la escena en silencio, da un sorbo lento a su taza.{/n} «Espero que un séquito reducido no sea obstáculo para que cumpla con su deber, {name}. Puede retirarse».

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, der die Szene schweigend beobachtet, nimmt einen langsamen Schluck aus seinem Becher.{/n} "Nun denn. Ich hoffe, ein etwas kleineres Gefolge hindert Euch nicht daran, Eure Pflicht zu tun, {name}. Wegtreten."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar, der die Szene schweigend beobachtet, nimmt einen langsamen Schluck aus seinem Becher.{/n} "Nun denn. Ich hoffe, ein etwas kleineres Gefolge hindert Euch nicht daran, Eure Pflicht zu tun, {name}. Wegtreten."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, qui s'était jusque-là contenté d'observer la scène en silence, porte sa coupe à ses lèvres et prend le temps d'en savourer une gorgée.{/n} « Eh bien... J'espère qu'un entourage réduit ne vous empêchera pas d'accomplir votre devoir, {name}. Vous pouvez disposer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar, who has been observing the unfolding scene in silence, takes a slow sip from his cup.{/n} "Well then. I hope a diminished retinue will be no obstacle to doing your duty, {name}. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar, qui s'était jusque-là contenté d'observer la scène en silence, porte sa tasse à ses lèvres et prend le temps d'en savourer une gorgée.{/n} « Eh bien... J'espère qu'un entourage réduit ne vous empêchera pas d'accomplir votre devoir, {name}. Vous pouvez disposer. »
